All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bank
Creates Bank Object
BarrierGrass
Creates grass
BonusReward
The bonus rewards are not necessary for fishing the game, but contain a higher reward compared to the regular rewards and collecting them improves the final score of the player.
Character
Abstract class for the enemy and the player
Enemy
Class for the Enemy, which will chase the player when the player in view range or move randomly when far from the player.
EnemyGenerator
EnemyGenerator clas to generate enemies on the game panel
FailMenu
Class to show the screen if the user looses the game
GameObject
Creates a GameObject that stores details of cells on the game board
GamePanel
It creates the panel where the game is being shown to the user
Helicopter
Creates Helicopter to be reached by the user to end the game
Image
Creates Images for everything the user sees on the map
KeyHandler
It handles the keyboard actions of the user
LevelGenerator
Creates a level from a JSON file using game objects
Main
Main class where everything starts
MainMenu
Class to show the screen if the user starts the game
MenuBar
Sets the bars that is being showed on during the gameplay
Player
Class for the Player
PoliceStation
Creates Police Station
PunishmentGenerator
Creates the punishment objects, and it makes sure that none of the punishments are in the same cell with each other.
PunishmentRoadBlock
Creates Punishment object to decrease player's score
RegularReward
All regular rewards have to be collected to win game.
Reward
The game includes a minimum of two types of rewards.
RewardGenerator
Creates the reward objects, and it makes sure that none of the rewards are in the same cell with punishment objects or with each other.
Road
Creates Road object
SuccessMenu
Class to show the screen if the user wins the game
Timer
Creates a timer to track game progress.
